title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 360.5 - Severability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 360.5 - Severability

State Regulations

If any provision of this Part or of Parts 361, 362, 363, 364, 365, 366, 369, or Subpart 374-2 of this Title or the application of any
provision of any of these Parts to any person or circumstance is held invalid, the remainder of this Part and of Parts 361, 362, 363, 364, 365, 366, 369, and

Subpart 374-2 of this Title, and the application of those provisions to persons
or circumstances other than those to which it is held invalid, shall not be
affected thereby. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
360.5

Adopted

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
